item.title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 Rating Surfaces in Singapore
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/tony-hawks-pro-skater-3-4-rating-surfaces-in-singapore/

Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 has been rated by The Infocomm Media Development Authority of Singapore. 

Spotted by Kurakasis (via Gematsu), if you head over to the Singaporean ratings website, you will see that Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 has been rated ‘General’ and has been ‘approved’ for the region, with the year release section stating ‘2025’. The website also reveals which platforms the game has been rated for, including PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC. 

Talks about a new Tony Hawks remake game have been making the rounds all week, starting with Professional skateboarder Tyshawn Jones’ comments, which pointed specifically towards an upcoming remaster. An industry insider later stated that Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 remaster will be shadow-dropped at the Xbox Summer Games Showcase. 

It doesn’t stop there; just a few days after, the game received another major tease, this time through a game from the same publisher, Activision. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6’s Grind map features a logo reminiscent of Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1+2, and within the logo is a number, 03.04.25, that could be teasing the arrival of the next remaster. With all the news and Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 rating being spotted in Singapore, an official announcement could arrive soon.

item.title: Fable Delayed Into 2026 By Xbox
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/fable-delayed-into-2026-by-xbox/

Xbox has announced that Fable has been delayed into 2026. The announcement comes via Xbox Studios head Craig Duncan during an episode of the official Xbox podcast.

“We previously announced Fable as 2025,” Duncan said while talking about his excitement for where the game is. “We are actually going to give Fable more time. It’s going to ship in 2026 now. While I know that’s not maybe the news people want to hear, what I want is to assure people that it’s definitely worth the wait.”

Duncan added: “I just have unequivocal confidence in the Playground team. If you think about their history and legacy for Forza Horizon—the last two games critically acclaimed…and just what they’re bringing to Fable as a franchise, just think of the visuals of what you expect of Playground Games plus amazing gameplay.”

Lastly, Duncan said the new Fable is the “most beautifully realized version of Albion” players have ever seen.

Fable was officially announced in 2020 but didn’t get its first proper trailer until 2023. The game’s 2025 release window was announced in June 2024.

As far as a more specific release window for 2026, that information wasn’t revealed.

item.title: Is Balatro Coming To Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/is-balatro-coming-to-xbox-game-pass/

Microsoft continues to bring a wealth of old and new titles to Xbox Game Pass, and Balatro continues to be the talk of the town over a year after its release. Here’s the latest update on the roguelike card game being introduced to a hungry public.

Balatro sucked me in within minutes of playing. It’s the kind of game that is instantly accessible but takes a long time to master. The concept of juggling Jokers and collecting cards is overwhelming at first. But it gets easier as time goes and Balatro’s core gameplay loop feeds on your time like a leech.

It’s won countless Game of the Year awards and sold over 5 million copies. If you’ve not had the chance to play Balatro yet, let’s see if you can through Xbox Game Pass.

Can You Play Balatro on Xbox Game Pass?

Balatro is now available to play on Xbox Game Pass if you have a valid subscription to the game offering service.

The February 24 Friends of Jimbo update added more content and cosmetic Joker designs. The update added Bugsnax, Assassin’s Creed, Slay the Princess, Fallout, Critical Role, Rust, Dead by Daylight, and Sid Meier’s Civilization 7 variations to choose from.

But, it also shocked everyone by shadow-dropping Balatro as an instant addition to the Xbox Game Pass catalog. That means if you have Game Pass, you can go and download Balatro for free this instant!

How to Play Balatro on Game Pass

Make sure you have an active Xbox Game Pass Subscription, search for Balatro on the Xbox Store, download it, and play Balatro.

Here’s a quick guide to playing Balatro through Microsoft’s Game Pass platform:

  1. Log in to your Microsoft account.
  2. Check to see if you have a valid Game Pass membership.
  3. If not, head to the Join Xbox Game page and subscribe to one of the plans.
  4. Head to the Xbox Store once your membership is live.
  5. Search for Balatro.
  6. Click to acquire the game through Game Pass on its official page.
  7. Download the title.
  8. Once this process is complete, you can now play Balatro!

I cannot recommend Balatro enough. It’s easy to play and very much a pick-up-and-play type of game. Have you only seen Balatro through social media clips? Or are you a Balatro expert? Let us know your best score and round performance! The Best Balatro seeds go a long way to achieving this.

If you’re scared to enter Balatro for the first time, don’t be. Here’s a ton of explainer guides to help you out: How to unlock the Throwback Joker, how to beat The Plant Boss Blind, How to unlock the Hit The Road Joker, How to unlock the Plasma Deck, what the Blank Voucher does, and what -1 Ante -1 Hand each round means.
